message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $60. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $90, would you consider that?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $85, is that a deal?
I'm getting close to the price I'm willing to pay, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. I'll meet you at $75. Can you sell it to me for that price?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $75, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from $85. How about $82.50?
I'm really close to the price I'm willing to pay, and I'm not sure I want to go any higher than that. I'll meet you at $80, which is the price John is offering. Can you sell it to me for that price?
